document_data.mainbody:
Bez was a goblin warrior and follower of the Absolute that lived in the Shattered Sanctum during the late 15 century DR.
She had a particular fondness and interest in the giant spiders that Dror Ragzlin kept in the depths of the Shattered Sanctum.
Bez was present at the Shattered Sanctum in the , when the leaders of the Shattered Sanctum began searching for individuals aboard a crashed nautiloid they believed were True Souls of their goddess.
